title: Alaska Public Lands: For Kids
body: For Kids          There is lots to do at the Anchorage Alaska Public Lands Information Center! We have scavenger hunts, movies, games, and much more.  If you can't pay us a visit you can still do a LOT of fun activities on our website! For more information visit: http://www.alaskacenters.gov/anchorage-for-kids.cfm
